ingredient.name: Resistant starch
ingredient.description: Specialized starch that resists digestion and promotes beneficial bacterial growth

microbiome_effects.mechanism: Primary degrader of resistant starch with specialized starch-degrading enzymes
Cross-feeding networks from starch degradation promote butyrate-producing bacteria

metabolic_effects.mechanism: Highest butyrate production among prebiotics through specialized bacterial fermentation

symptom_effects.population_notes: Improves glucose metabolism and weight management with enhanced satiety and stool form

citations.title: Recent systematic review of resistant starch
